timeline.message: small fix in Comment statement, removed not needed cursorSpecification, code formatting

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather keep these braces. What happens if someone later wants to add a second statement and forgets to put it into the braces?
timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText:
Removing CursorSpecification actually breaks compatibility, because now the Cursor is parsed as CursorBody.
I'll change it so that we remove CursorBody instead and keep CursorSpecification.
timeline.author: adangel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -473,8 +473,6 @@ ASTDeclarativeUnit DeclarativeUnit()  :
 		ProgramUnit()  |
 		LOOKAHEAD(4)
 		VariableOrConstantDeclaration() |
-		LOOKAHEAD(2)
-		CursorSpecification() |
